abstract: They may be a few last-minute deals straggling in, but as the first quarter comes to a close, Goldman Sachs has a firm lead in the mergers-and-acquisitions league tables. Goldman had an advisory role in 104 announced deals with a total value of $311 billion so far this year, or about 29 percent of the $1.08 trillion of deals worldwide, according to Thomson Financial.
lead_paragraph: They may be a few last-minute deals straggling in, but as the first quarter comes to a close, Goldman Sachs has a firm lead in the mergers-and-acquisitions league tables. Goldman had an advisory role in 104 announced deals with a total value of $311 billion so far this year, or about 29 percent of the $1.08 trillion of deals worldwide, according to Thomson Financial.

headline.main: Goldman and Citi Lead Dealmaker Rankings
